bespin.name: Bespin
bespin.desc: A port of the Bespin theme.

dark-fruit-salad.name: Dark Fruit Salad
dark-fruit-salad.desc: Low contrast theme ported from the set_geany_colors utility

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.desc: Port of the Fluffy theme from gedit-themes.

gedit.name: Gedit
gedit.desc: A port of Gedit's default theme.

kugel.name: Kugel
kugel.desc: A dark, but not too dark with focus to be comfortable to the eyes.

oblivion2.name: Oblivion 2
oblivion2.desc: Based on the Gedit color scheme Oblivion and the Dark Color Scheme with rearranged colors.

railcasts2.name: Railcasts 2
railcasts2.desc: A port of railscasts2 from gedit-themes.

retro.name: Retro
retro.desc: Inspired by old green screen terminals.

slushpoppies.name: Slush and Poppies
slushpoppies.desc: A port of Slush and Poppies from gedit-themes.

tango-dark.name: Tango
tango-dark.desc: Loosely based on the Dark theme, but Tangofied.

tango-light.name: Tango Light
tango-light.desc: A light theme using Tango colors.

zenburn.name: Zenburn
zenburn.desc: A port of Zenburn from gedit-themes.
